argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | conjghm.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | conjghm.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | conjghm.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | conjsubg.f | |- F = ( x e. S |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_subgss | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S C_ X ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> S C_ X ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-ima | |- ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) " S ) = ran ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) |` S ) |
| 8 |  | #P_resmpt | |- ( S C_ X -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) |` S ) = ( x e. S |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( S C_ X -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) |` S ) = F ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_rneqd | |- ( S C_ X -> ran ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) |` S ) = ran F ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( S C_ X -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) " S ) = ran F ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) " S ) = ran F ) |
| 13 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 14 | #P_conjghm | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) e. ( G GrpHom G ) /\ ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) : X -1-1-onto-> X ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) e. ( G GrpHom G ) /\ ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) : X -1-1-onto-> X ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) e. ( G GrpHom G ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ghmima | |- ( ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) e. ( G GrpHom G ) /\ S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) " S ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 20 | 17, 18, 19 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( x e. X |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) " S ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 21 | 12, 20 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> ran F e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
